bow: what did your kid throw tantrum about recently today my 17 month old threw window shattering tantrum because he blew me kiss and *gasp* blew him one back seriously what are the terrible two because if this stage doesn even have nickname don know what going to do in seven months with this kid if it really gets worse gave my kid his water bottle that he asked for instead of leaving it on the counter so that he could get it himself my three year old was crying the other night because his bed was too fluffy when my son was that age we said he practicing to be haha but whoever said terrible twos never met year old two year olds are great three year olds are the holes my daughter handed me toy and took it because she handed it to me maybe was just supposed to look at it lol can attest to this have year old and year old and oh boy the terrible twos is breeze my 17 months old wasn allowed to play with the kitchen knives my one year old pulled his own hair and it hurt this one killed me my 14 yr old got mad because we made her take shower in her own bathroom said why do you hate me then slammed her bedroom door hubby and almost peed ourselves laughing 13 month old wanted to feed me his chewed up toast and refused to eat it because took away his toy that he used to hit the dog in the face we made him get out of the bathtub before he gave himself concussion he then got mad that said in my sternest mom voice no we do not hit our mommies and daddies my daughter turned in early january she is definitely testing boundaries and has her terrible two moments but think this age is infinitely easier than 15 19 months found that period to be extremely challenging and recall breaking down in tears on the reg me crying not the kid but her too picture of door in book wouldn open my 21 month old is obsessed with bags and purses and is 100 positive that all purses are never draped over the shoulder using the strap and are of course squeezed under the arm and magically held in place she has like ten tantrums day because try to put the strap on her shoulder and her bags don magically stay attached to her torso it so crazy my 22 month old will pull or push the bathroom door closed and then promptly screech until we open it lather rinse repeat 🤦🏻‍♀️ yes agree the 18 ish month stage is tricky because they do have the words to express themselves being at the park so it was either she cold she did like being outside she did like the swing the play car the other kids etc she only liked dogs my very dramatic 11 month old just had complete meltdown after trying and failing to stand toy on its end stole his boogers then you have much to look forward to when the kid turns four otherwise known as the cking fours last night my son did want to take bath then again because he did want to get out of the bath wouldn let her eat bird poop hahaha he almost now beginning to catch glimpses of what will be like 😂🙄 in the last week the show he wanted to watch was playing on the tv it wasn cloudy out and didn put soap in the dryer with the clean clothes 🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️ 3yos are nuts my year old only just turned less than month ago threw an awful fit because told her she couldn breathe under water bath time was cut short after that one ve made up some of my own for my kids over the years so far feel that these have been very accurate the ornery ones the troublesome twos the terrible threes the f*ck you fours the forget about it fives the sick of it sixes the situational sevens the evened out eights the naughty nines the triggered tens and ll let you know what ve decided to name the following years as they come ve got kids 10 and and still have yet to figure out how to navigate through those lovely phases of behavior without incident dd1 will be two in less than week she had freakout because we were watching blippi together when went to the bathroom while in there the video did one of those mid point commercials it was one of those ridiculous minute long ones that has nothing to do with kids as was on the toilet was unaware of this hear her screaming blue murder rush back into the room with my pants down just for her to turn to me and screech blippi gone silently skip the add and go back to the bathroom to wipe my ass and compose myself told my sixteen month old she couldn play in the garbage agree this already feels like the terrible twos what am in for haha bath time has been fight recently with my sixteen month old because *gasp* don let her jump in the bathtub been there for sure ca remember the exact details but pretty sure it was because he asked me to help him with something and did my twins have two modes heart melting cuddle monkey fuck you wan na fight they are two there is an in between they figured out if they snatch the glasses off of my face it disables me our current and most consistent tantrum has to do with the fact that they are allowed to eat the peel on clementines like they can their apples the resulting tantrum sounds like apple ma ma nooooo nonono apple apple apple but that just rough translation it hard to hear them over my own laughter because the graceful way they throw themselves to the floor is hilarious that why they say terrible twos terrifying threes frightening fours this was few weeks ago my 21 month old had fit that she could wear all of her hats at the same time put one on her she handed me different one so took off the first one to put the second one on her head cue melt down hear threenagers lot lately it been my 16 month old losing it because he can carry the week old around used to do that still kinda do this my 11 year old just got her period and she had breakdown because she had shoulder pad between her legs it was panty liner not ready for this one of my 5yo twins threw tantrum outside in the snow today because she couldn walk trough the snow she was laying down my 22 month old wanted daddy to keep drying his hair with the hair dryer his hair was dry came home to the of them having tug of war with the cord hear that one too just does fit the above pattern but it definitely accurate wouldnt let my kid play with daddy 1000 piece puzzle then could produce daddy on demand he was in the shower then cursed loudly when something caught fire in the kitchen because stepped away to deal with him my older son does this all the time don understand lol do know if it makes you feel any better but the terrible two actually refer to the second year of life the one your kiddo is living right now there were many weeks from the age 16 20 21 months where would have sold my son to travelling band of gypsies so it made me feel lot better to learn that the stage *did* have nickname that is so funny today picked my son up looked at my husband and said is there swear with no exaggeration that my dude threw non stop tantrum for two days do think he stopped screaming once except while he was asleep everything was wrong and horrible and my eardrums needed to
